Constructor & Destructor Documentation

◆ KBLASMemoryTreeNode()

template<int K>
KBLASMemoryTreeNode< K >::KBLASMemoryTreeNode ( const Hyperrect &  r,
const int  k,
const Color  color,
const Node *  src,
const size_t  sizeof_type 
)
inline

A new node is being created from a split, make it inherit its original node 'src'

  • access - the access
  • r - the shrinked rect that this is inheriting from
  • k - the dimension that got splitted
  • color - the node color
  • src - the node that got split

We have: U (src->hyperrect, r) == the node rect before being shrinked n (src->hyperrect, r) = {} - empty intersection
